attributes.title: DEATH BATTLE! Has Too Many Flips! | The Industry Ep. 2
attributes.caption: You guys have been asking us to return to Live action for years, so SHARE this video TOMORROW when it goes live for the rest of the world. If you like content like this, we've got to get eyes on it! Spread the word, and I greatly hope you enjoy!

attributes.title: Craig is a P&$%!Y | The Industry Episode 3
attributes.caption: Hey g1's! Believe it or not, this ACTUALLY happened EXACTLY like this. We're not kidding. That's one of the reasons we love this show so much. Although our episodes will continue to get even more ridiculous as the season goes, thi
attributes.description: Hey g1's! Believe it or not, this ACTUALLY happened EXACTLY like this. We'renot kidding. That's one of the reasons welove this show so much. Although our episodes will continue to get even more ridiculous as the season goes, this episode is definitely the closest one to reality. Hope you enjoy, and please feel free to grow the show! It's doing GREAT so far and weappreciate all of the love!- Shaun & John Francis McCullagh
attributes.display_title: Craig is a P&$%!Y | The Industry Episode 3

attributes.title: The Dildo Episode | The Industry Ep. 4
attributes.caption:
Hello g1's! 

Hope you like the latest episode of The Industry! We appreciate all of the help spreading the word about the show so far, and we're very
attributes.description: Hello g1's!Hope you like the latest episode of The Industry! We appreciate all of the help spreading the word about the show so far, and we're very excited for how successful each episode has been! Really, it means a lot. Anyways this episode IS in fact based on Shaun's efforts to get Craig to let him make a video with a Dildo in it, using his real pitches for pranking people with it.Hope you liked it, and we look forward to what you have to say about it . . . and the prospect of next week's cliffhanger!Thank you g1's, and please remember to share this tomorrow when it's available for all!
attributes.display_title: The Dildo Episode | The Industry Ep. 4

attributes.title: DEATH BATTLE's Hard Drive is GONE!
attributes.caption: Had So much fun making the series! Hopefully we'll see you in Season 2 next year! Thanks for all of your support with the new show. Means the world.
